content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. The "Groupby and Aggregate" exercise is a great way to practice your pandas skills, and with the hint and example code, you should be able to tackle it easily.

Remember to take your time, read the problem statement carefully, and break down the problem into smaller steps. If you get stuck, don't hesitate to ask for help or refer to the pandas documentation.

Once you've completed the exercise, feel free to come back and ask me for feedback or guidance on the next steps. I'm here to help you improve your pandas skills and tackle more challenging exercises.

Good luck, and have fun coding!
